keyMoments.title: Brook's Farewell Concert as Soul King
keyMoments.description: Brook performs his final concert on Sabaody Archipelago as the world-famous musician 'Soul King', showing the immense popularity he gained during the two-year timeskip.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Brook's tremendous growth in fame and influence during the timeskip, establishing him as a globally recognized celebrity.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you all for coming! This will be my final performance!

keyMoments.title: Brook Declares Luffy is Alive
keyMoments.description: During his performance of 'New World', Brook publicly declares that Straw Hat Luffy is still alive, countering the rumors of his death.
keyMoments.significance: Brook uses his worldwide platform to announce Luffy's survival, showing his unwavering loyalty to his captain.
keyMoments.quote: Straw Hat Luffy... Dead? Ridiculous! Tell this to the world. The Pirate Straw Hat Luffy is ALIVE!

keyMoments.title: Brook Escapes from Marines
keyMoments.description: With help from his audience and the Rosy Life Riders, Brook escapes from the Marines on a flying fish after his concert.
keyMoments.significance: Brook successfully evades arrest and begins his journey to reunite with the Straw Hat Pirates.

bounties.reason: Active bounty from 50 years ago as member of Rumbar Pirates, confirmed when Marines identify him

reveals.information: Became world-famous musician 'Soul King' during the two-year timeskip
His 33,000,000 bounty from 50 years ago as 'Humming Brook' is still active

keyMoments.title: Franky Reveals Post-Timeskip Body Modifications
keyMoments.description: Franky appears before his crewmates with his drastically modified cyborg body, featuring much larger arms, shoulders, and torso with 'BF-37' markings.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of Franky's major upgrades using Vegapunk's technology from his time on Baldimore.

keyMoments.title: Franky Demonstrates 'Franky Hair Salon'
keyMoments.description: Franky demonstrates his ability to change his hairstyle instantly by pressing his nose like a button for more than three seconds.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the creative and versatile nature of Franky's self-modifications.

keyMoments.title: Franky Reveals Enhanced Hands and Voice
keyMoments.description: Franky shows his enlarged hands with concealed normal-sized hands inside, and demonstrates his ability to make his voice sound robotic.
keyMoments.significance: Further demonstrates the extent of Franky's technological upgrades and versatility.

abilities.description: Franky can change his hairstyle instantly by pressing his nose like a button for more than three seconds, allowing various hair configurations.
Drastically enlarged and reinforced body with robotic enhancements including larger arms, shoulders, and torso based on Vegapunk's technology.
Normal-sized hands concealed within his giant robotic hands for delicate work.
Ability to modulate his voice to sound robotic.

reveals.information: Gained major body modifications using Vegapunk's blueprints during the two-year timeskip on Baldimore

keyMoments.title: Introduction of Demaro Black and Fake Straw Hat Crew
keyMoments.description: Demaro Black appears impersonating Monkey D. Luffy, leading the Fake Straw Hat Crew and using the real crew's reputation to intimidate and recruit pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the main antagonist of the Return to Sabaody Arc.

keyMoments.title: Fake Straw Hats Recruit Pirates
keyMoments.description: Using the Straw Hats' reputation, Demaro Black successfully recruits about 100 pirates to his fake crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how powerful the Straw Hat Pirates' reputation has become.

bounties.reason: His real bounty revealed when Pacifista identifies him

reveals.information: Impersonating Monkey D. Luffy to exploit the Straw Hats' reputation

keyMoments.title: Manjaro Appears as Fake Zoro
keyMoments.description: Manjaro appears impersonating Roronoa Zoro with a beer gut and Marine-style swords, encountering Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the main fake Straw Hat crew members.

reveals.information: Impersonating Roronoa Zoro as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew

keyMoments.title: Chocolat Appears as Fake Nami
keyMoments.description: Chocolat appears as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew, impersonating Nami despite being much older and having vastly different physical features.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the fake Nami imposter.

reveals.information: Impersonating Nami as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew

keyMoments.title: Turco Appears as Fake Franky
keyMoments.description: Turco appears as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew, impersonating Franky as a tall, lanky thin man with a long neck.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the fake Franky imposter.

reveals.information: Impersonating Franky as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew

keyMoments.title: Mounblutain Appears as Fake Sogeking
keyMoments.description: Mounblutain appears as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew, impersonating Sogeking as a large man wearing a fake mask.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the fake Sogeking/Usopp imposter.

reveals.information: Impersonating Sogeking as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew

keyMoments.title: Drip Appears as Fake Sanji
keyMoments.description: Drip appears impersonating Sanji as a thin man with an unruly haircut, encountering Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the fake Sanji imposter.

reveals.information: Impersonating Sanji as part of the Fake Straw Hat Crew
